explains: n. 边缘；<英>（道路旁的）植草路肩，绿地；极限，临界点；山墙突瓦；权杖
v. 趋向，接近，濒临；处在边缘
wordGroup: on the verge of 濒临于；接近于

sentences.en: He seemed to be on the verge of total derangement.
sentences.cn: 他似乎已濒临精神崩溃的边缘。

sentences.en: The mountain gorilla is on the verge of extinction.
sentences.cn: 居住在山区的大猩猩已濒临灭绝。

sentences.en: I'm sad that Julie's marriage is on the verge of splitting up.
sentences.cn: 我为朱莉的婚姻处于破裂的边缘感到难过。
